name: Octoshotgun
description: This is a small joke weapon I made in a few hours. An eight-barreled shotgun. And you thought the quad-barrel was overkill :P The sprites are a little shaky since I had to extend them in Photoshop. I also know that the hand is cut off for a frame, but it doesn't really matter since it goes by so quickly. There are over 25 frames just for reloading since it takes so long. Video Preview: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3tkRGR5h49Y
